fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once per phase, immediately learn someone's true role.
- During the day, rewrite someone's role card (except goal and faction), provided you've learned their role. It will take effect at the beginning of the night.
- During the night, send someone a false notification.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may learn someone's role and use your other available ability at the same time.
- One use Basic defense auto-shield.
- You have Manage Nickname permissions. You lose them on game end or death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the good faction lose.
